message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price more around $10,500. I believe this is still a fair price considering the value of the product to me. What do you think?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further,  how about $11,000?  It's still a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident the product will be worth it to you. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm getting close to your offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,750. Can you consider this price?
